about_the_game:
"Psycho World: Alpine Survival"
casts you into a vast, haunting Alpine region, where the remnants of a catastrophic event linger like a dark veil over the mountains. In this multiplayer survival epic, players are not merely surviving; they are rewriting the saga of a world gone eerily silent.

As a survivor of unknown calamities, you must navigate the treacherous terrain, from snow-capped peaks to shadow-filled valleys. The environment is your canvas and survival your masterpiece. Erect fortresses from scavenged ruins, hunt for sustenance in forests where silence is a predator, and forge alliances with fellow survivors to combat the encroaching oblivion.

Here, the weather is a formidable adversary, with each snowfall and storm altering your strategy. Construct shelter against blizzards, adapt to the freezing cold, and always stay vigilant as the Alpine world evolves with the seasons.

But survival is more complex than enduring the elements; it’s about confronting the psyche’s shadows. Each abandoned village and silent street may hold clues to the region’s downfall. In "Psycho World," every crumbling wall, every desolate roadway, and every whispered legend is a piece of a larger, more ominous puzzle.

The game's intricate building system allows you to craft not just structures but a legacy amid the frostbite and fear. Secure strongholds, establish resource lines, and defend your domain against whatever lurks in the mists.

With "Psycho World: Alpine Survival," you're not just playing a game; you're immersing yourself in an experience where the boundary between reality and madness blurs. Are you prepared to confront the secrets of the Alps? Will you thrive, or will you become another whispered tale in the Psycho World? The mountain awaits your story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Stranded in a desolate Alpine region post-catastrophe, survive the silence, uncover secrets, and brave the wilderness. Will you emerge from the shadows of the mountains?
